entry.title: [GRA][WebHosting] - Logs on Clusters 031- 002-006 - 014 - 029 Bitdefender Endpoint Security Tools
entry.content:
Jul 25, 13:15 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Jul 25, 13:14 UTC
Update - The current workaround, which is to use https instead of http, only works for MacOS users.
For Windows users, the only way out is to disable bitdefender Endpoint Security Tools or use another device.

Jul 25, 12:31 UTC
Update - Further investigation show impact on clusters :
Cluster002
Cluster006
Cluster014
Cluster024
Cluster029
Cluster031

If the file is indeed a False Positive, the detection will be removed in the next 72 hours and the modification will be implemented in the product through a Signature Update.
Please keep your Bitdefender up-to-date.

Jul 25, 09:10 UTC
Identified - Start time : 25/07/2023 09:02 UTC
Service impact : Customer who use "Bitdefender Endpoint Security Tools" may be blocked on http://logs.cluster031.hosting.ovh.net/
Bitdefender has been contacted to correct this false positive issue.
Customer need to ensure use https://logs.cluster031.hosting.ovh.net/ and not http://logs.cluster031.hosting.ovh.net/ (just use https)

entry.title: [BHS/GRA][Web Hosting] - OVHcloud Web Statistics
entry.content:
Jul 24, 15:13 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 7, 20:43 UTC
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 3, 08:36 UTC
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 24, 15:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 17, 22:11 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 24/04/2023 15:00 UTC
End time : 24/07/2023 15:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our product lifecycle management, we have decided to end the access of its predecessor: Urchin statistics collection service. It won't be available from Monday 24 april 2023.
Since 2021, we have made available our new tool to display your website statistics, called OVHcloud Web Statistics which can be accessed with your hosting logs.
Documentation about OVHcloud Web Statistics: https://docs.ovh.com/us/en/hosting/shared_view_my_websites_logs_and_statistics/ .

Please note that this maintenance only covers Webhosting statistics before February 2020.
Statistics after February 2020 are available in Owstats.
Logs collection and Daily statistics aren't in the scope of the maintenance.

Timeline :
Monday 24 April 2023: Closing of the service accessibility
Monday 24 April 2023: End of Support, Shutdown of the service
Monday 24 July 2023: Data deletion


We will update this task during the proposed timeline.

entry.title: [GRA2][Collaborative solutions] - Mailjet email perturbation on cluster007
entry.content:
Jul 21, 12:40 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 16/06/2023 09:30 UTC
End Time : 27/06/2023 19:21 UTC
Root cause : The service is functional but new disruptions may occur.
External platforms, including those that allow emails to be sent, can sometimes implement security mechanisms to protect their service against unwanted access or attacks.
This may occasionally affect your accessibility to their services, particularly in a shared environment.
Workaround : Customers can use the specialized provider of your choice to send your emails from your web hosting plan.
We suggest that you check sending statistics regularly to optimize your campaigns.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 27, 19:21 UTC
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Jun 16, 10:15 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 16/06/2023 09:30 UTC
Service impact : Email sent through cluster007 might be blocked. Our teams have implemented a workaround. Mailjet is currently functional.
Root cause : Our technical teams are working with the partner to resolve the incident.
Ongoing actions : Monitoring
